name: María Ruiz
desc: Una senyora de 72 anys que viu per als seus fills i els seus néts. Nascuda a un poblet de Córdoba, va mudar-se a Barcelona en casar-se amb el seu marit i viu aquí des de llavors. Ella i el seu marit han pogut donar una bona vida als seus tres fills i amb només això ella viu feliç.
descENG: A 72-year-old woman who lives for her children and grandchildren. Born in a small village in Córdoba, she moved to Barcelona when she married her husband and has lived here ever since. She and her husband were able to provide a good life for their three children, and that alone is enough to makes her happy.
